name: 林逾先
objective:
本課程教導學生管理一項專案時，有關時間及成本的估計、進度表與預算的編列、以及其他監督控制一項專案進行之相關技巧與應用。專案計劃書的發展、專案投資的可行性分析、專案的風險評估、專案的介面管理，以及專案團隊與專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。
This course teaches students the estimations of time and cost when managing a project, the development of project schedule and budget, and other relevant skills in monitoring and controlling the project. The development of project proposal, feasibility study of project investment, project risk assessment, project interface management, and the role of project manager in a project team within an organization will also be discussed.
schedule:
1  課程介紹 (發給課程大綱及課程講義)
   Introduction (course outlines and class teaching notes)
2  專案的觀念、定義與應用領域
   Concept and definition of “project” with applications
3  專案經理及專案團隊的組織型態
   Project manager and the types of project team
4  專案計劃書的發展
   Development of project proposal
5  教師出國開會（停課一天）
   Instructor out of country on business (No class)
6  專案投資可行性分析與選擇指標
   Project investment feasibility and selection criteria
7  運動會補假（停課一天）
   Make-up holiday (No class)
8  專案風險評估與監控
   Project risk assessment and monitoring
9  期中考試
   Mid-term examination
10 專案介面管理
   interface management
11 專案網路圖
   Project network representation
12 專案進度表的編排方式
   Development of project scheduling
13 專案預算與成本的監控
   Budgeting and cost control of a project
14 限制性資源之專案排程
   Project scheduling with constrained resource
15 專案資源平滑
   Project resource leveling
16 專案趕工時間及成本之抵換（專案趕工策略的擬定）
   Project time and cost trade offs (Project crashing strategy)
17 專案作業時間之估算與完工之機率
   Estimation of activity time and the probability of
   project completion within a time frame
18 期末考試
   Final examination
